name: Dev Nursery Gardens
description: Dev Nursery Garden is a well-known garden located in Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu, India. It is celebrated for its diverse collection of plants, flowers, and ornamental trees, making it a popular destination for botany enthusiasts and tourists alike. The garden offers a serene environment for leisurely walks amidst colorful blooms and verdant foliage. With its peaceful ambiance and scenic views, Dev Nursery Garden provides visitors with a refreshing retreat in the heart of Kanyakumari.
